sentences.en: 'Still,'said Darnay,'you know how gloomy and threatening the sky is.'
sentences.cn: “ 可是, ”达尔内说, “ 天空有多么阴暗,预示着风暴到临, 你是知道的. ”

sentences.en: A few faint gleams of sunshine lit up the gloomy afternoon.
sentences.cn: 几束隐约的阳光使阴暗的下午有些明亮.

sentences.en: Anne dismissed these gloomy thoughts from her mind.
sentences.cn: 安妮抛开了心里这些沮丧的念头。

sentences.en: As for her engagement with Adam, I would say the portents are gloomy.
sentences.cn: 至于她和亚当的婚约，我看兆头不妙。

sentences.en: Chances of getting the job were slim, so the young man felt gloomy about the future.
sentences.cn: 得到这份工作的机会很小, 所以这位青年人感到前途渺茫.

sentences.en: Her trainer was even more gloomy about the prospects for British tennis.
sentences.cn: 她的教练对英国网球的前景甚至更为悲观.

sentences.en: I felt a gloomy foreboding that something was going to go wrong.
sentences.cn: 我有一种不祥的预感,总觉得要出事.

sentences.en: I'm haunted with gloomy thoughts and sad memories.
sentences.cn: 我常为悲观的思想和悲痛的追念所困扰.

sentences.en: Inside it's gloomy after all that sunshine.
sentences.cn: 尽管阳光明媚，里面依然暗淡无光。

sentences.en: It was a gloomy room with one small window.
sentences.cn: 房间里阴森森的，只有一扇小窗。

sentences.en: It was a wet and gloomy day.
sentences.cn: 那一日阴天下雨沉闷无聊。

sentences.en: Some good might come of all this gloomy business.
sentences.cn: 生意不景气也未必全是坏事。

sentences.en: The report paints a gloomy picture of the economy.
sentences.cn: 这篇报告描绘了一幅惨淡的经济现状。

sentences.en: The short-term outlook for employment remains gloomy.
sentences.cn: 近期的就业前景依然暗淡。

sentences.en: They found him in gloomy, downbeat mood.
sentences.cn: 他们发现他情绪低落，无精打采。

sentences.en: We sat about in the gloomy airport lounge.
sentences.cn: 我们百无聊赖地坐在阴暗的候机大厅里。

sentences.en: When I saw their gloomy faces, I knew something was wrong.
sentences.cn: 当我看到他们沮丧的脸时, 我知道出事了.

words.tran_cn: 变阴暗；变忧沉；感到沮丧

trans.tran_cn: 黑暗的，令人沮丧的，前景黯淡的，悲观的，阴郁的
trans.tran_en: making you feel that things will not improve
